name: Welcome to Dalaca
description:
Made during the GAMERella 2016 at Poitiers (France).
You're the technician behind the immigration website of the Dalaca, try to keep it online as long as you can !

The game is in French only.

Controls

Click with your mouse on the cross to close pop-up and type on your keyboard to fill the debugging window. Don't forget to Refresh your page regularly!

Credits

Clément Rondeau - Development
Marie Lou Boisaubert - Graphics
Colette Paugame - Graphics
Florent Chardevel - Sound Design

Made with Unity.
